DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of Betahistine Mesilate in the treatment of patients with vertigo caused by Cerebral Infarction in posterior circulation.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of Betahistine Mesilate In The Treatment Of Patients With Vertigo Caused By Cerebral Infarction In Posterior Circulation
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients that have a clinical diagnosis of posterior circulation infarction and vertigo occurring within 1 month after the infarction.
